Function reference

All functions

apply_weekly_lag()
Apply a 7 day lag to the variable n_crisis
clip()
Clips a number to the specified minimum and maximum values.
complete_grid_for_polygons()
Prepares the grid of QuadKeys for the conversion to square polygons
create_qk_grid()
Create grid of QuadKeys for a particular level of detail.
create_raster()
Create a stars raster
data_provided
data_provided: fake dataset
extract_qk_coord()
Extract lat/long coordinates from the QuadKey number
extract_tile_coord()
Extract lat/long coordinates from the tile XY coordinates.
format_data()
Format the data
grid_to_polygon()
Convert a grid of QuadKeys to square polygons
ground_res()
Ground resolution at a specified latitude and level of detail
latlong_to_pixelXY()
Converts lat/long coordinates to pixel XY coordinates
latlong_to_quadkey()
Convert latitude/longitude coordinates into QuadKeys
mapscale()
Map scale (1 : N)
mapsize()
Map size in pixels
missing_combinations()
Detects dates and times missing
pixelXY_to_latlong()
Converts pixel XY coordinatess into lat/long coordinates.
pixelXY_to_tileXY()
Converts pixel XY coordinates into tile XY coordinates
polygon_to_raster()
Create and save raster images for different dates and times
quadkey_to_latlong()
Convert a string of Quadkey numbers to lat/long coordinates
quadkey_to_tileXY()
Converts a QuadKey into tile XY coordinates.
read_all_files()
Read all the .csv files in a folder and format the data.
regular_qk_grid()
Converts a irregular QuadKey grid into a regular grid
result_read_all_files
result_read_all_files: Fake dataset
tileXY_to_pixelXY()
Convert tile XY coordinates into pixel XY coordinates
tileXY_to_quadkey()
Converts tile XY coordinates into a quadkey.
